package assignment1;

public class Persnaldetails {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		/*
		 * Question:
Write a Java program that:
Stores the following details using primitive data types only:
oAge (int)
oHeight in centimeters (float)
oMobile number (long)
oIs student (boolean)
Prints all the values on separate lines.
		 */
		int age=23;
		float Hight=127.8F;
		long mobile=908765645;
		boolean student=true;
		System.out.println("age=" + age);
		System.out.println("Height in centimeters=" +Hight);
		System.out.println("Mobile number=" +mobile);
		System.out.println("Is student =" +student);

		
		
		
	}

}
